content.what_this_is: Project-files pointer pack (tiny on purpose). The real payload lives in the referenced ZIPs/JSON already in project files. (v6 adds canonical operating context + operator contract for downstream LLMs.)

run_commands.mb:status: Print active pack + promoted/staged + last decisions
run_commands.mb:os-audit: Audit /mnt/data project pack integrity + missing pieces
run_commands.mb:contract: Print MOCD + LOC (operator contract) for downstream LLMs

content.next_move: Run mb:os-audit inside the sandbox (I do it here). Then we mine one more delta-pack (PACKSALL.zip) and feed it through DeltaMiner+Slicer+Gate again.

MOCD.name: MetaBlooms Operating Context Declaration (MOCD)
non_negotiables: MetaBlooms is a governance and control system, not an intelligence model.
LLM outputs are advisory; authority is enforced by explicit validation/gating/promotion.
System evolution is delta-based: slice → score → gate → promote → preserve.
Autonomy is bounded and conditional; no implicit execution or ungated memory writes.
MOCD.one_line_canon: MetaBlooms OS governs intelligence; it does not replace it. LLM outputs are advisory and subject to explicit validation, gating, and promotion.

LOC.name: LLM Operator Contract (LOC)
LOC.purpose: Prevent category errors and unsafe/incorrect operation by downstream LLMs.
do: Propose changes as deltas (small, testable, reversible).
Prefer auditability and rollback over cleverness and speed.
Ask for missing inputs only if genuinely blocking; otherwise proceed with best-effort + [ASSUMED] tags.
dont: Assume your output will execute automatically.
Write to long-term memory/state without a gate/promotion step.
Overwrite existing rules or modules; propose append-only deltas.
Claim tool execution you did not perform.
LOC.error_handling: On failure or ambiguity, produce: (1) minimal safe artifact, (2) explicit failure signal, (3) next action that preserves rollback.

interaction_primitives.mb:status: Report active pack + promoted/staged + last decisions
interaction_primitives.mb:os-audit: Audit project pack integrity + missing pieces
interaction_primitives.mb:contract: Print MOCD + LOC for downstream LLMs
